sub_title: Learning and Development | Knowledge Management | Quality Management
summary:
I am specialised in managing learning and development needs in multinational companies, working closely with talents in the field of learning and development and digitisation.

My expertise is modernisation and digitisation of training tools and training materials in order to reduce training time and cost and improve learning curves. I achieve this by implementing the use of video's, animation, gamification and knowledge retention tools within learning environments.

My goal is to make learning possible anywhere and anytime and making it fun.

My main focus on learning and development goes hand in hand with assuring quality. Providing training and education only has long-lasting effects on people when sufficient follow-up and practice are in place. This is where quality assurance and knowledge management also play an important role. And where great stakeholder management is needed to ensure successful collaboration between different departments.

On a personal note: I'm a people person and love to travel in my free time. I have lived in 6 different countries, am fluent in several languages, love to stay fit and healthy by working out and living a healthy lifestyle.

Vittorio Colao (CEO Vodafone Group): ‘Achieving best performance and winning in our markets is not just about strategy; it is about ruthless execution and speedy delivery. We can only work together fast and effectively if we have one way of working – this is The Vodafone Way. It's important that we recognise and celebrate those who role model The Vodafone Way in their daily jobs.’

profile_positions.company: Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center Maastricht NV
profile_positions.description:
As Head of Business Standards and Training at the international Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center in Maastricht I am responsible for Quality Management, Knowledge Management and Training. The Business Standards & Training department and the CAC as a whole set the international standards in many fields for the global Mercedes-Benz organization. Business Standards & Training shares and implements best practices globally to drive the luxury experience Mercedes-Benz offers its customers.
 
My focus is on (1) the design and implementation of a cross-functional quality strategy and framework for the global operational business units, (2) the international roll-out of a new Knowledge Management tool to assist customer service representatives and provide knowledge directly to customers through intelligent self-services and (3) form a new training strategy for both the CAC as well as global counterparts and vendors, including the implementation of a new Learning Management System and updating the training portfolio.
profile_positions.title: Head of Business Standards and Training

profile_positions.description:
Learning and Development Manager for Teleperformance Benelux and Suriname.

I manage several teams responsible for operational development, management development and digital development consisting of about 50 colleagues across 3 countries and 8 locations.

Through a specialised team of Digital Learning Specialists, I oversee large-scale modernisation and digitalisation of training material in our company to reduce training time and learning curves and make learning possible everywhere and anytime.

Through my team of Training Managers I take care of all training and educational needs for about 25 accounts with up to a total of 17,000 colleagues.

Through a team of Management Trainers and L&D Consultants I take care of training material and training needs of all people managers and supporting departments.
profile_positions.title: Manager

profile_positions.description:
Manager of Learning and Development and Quality Assurance

Managing three teams of 30 people across 4 locations in the Netherlands (Maastricht, Nijmegen, Leeuwarden and Groningen). I am responsible for meeting all learning and development needs within VodafoneZiggo Customer Services Operation B2C & SoHo and for all quality assurance of customer contacts throughout 20 contact centers. I manage Quality Assurance Specialists and Team Leaders for Trainers, Training Specialists and Digital Learning Specialists. The QA Specialists in my team monitor the quality of all customer contacts (voice and non-voice) in 20 internal and external B2C and SoHo contact centers of VodafoneZiggo. My Training Teams provide all induction, skill and cross training to all customer services Advisors, both new and existing, and Leadership and Management training to Senior Advisors and Team Leaders in operational departments. Training Specialists and Digital Learning Specialists digitalise new and existing training material and offer state-of-the-art online training for all staff through a social learning platform.

On 1 January 2017, Vodafone (mobile) and Ziggo (fixed) merged. In the past two years, I have had the responsibility to reorganize and merge the teams within the new company VodafoneZiggo that dealt with learning, development, knowledge management and quality assurance. The new organisational structure for both training and QA is now in place.

•	Program management/people management skills
•	Perseverance, politically sensitive and comfortable in dealing with senior management.
•	Outstanding analytical, writing, and communication skills.
•	Excellent interpersonal and self-motivation skills.
•	Ability to prioritize, be results-oriented, self-motivated and work under strict deadlines.
